metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6480 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient policy enforcement in enterprise in Google Chrome prior to83.0.4103.61 allowed a local attacker to bypass navigation restrictions viaUI actions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6480` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '83.0.4103.61-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
